Comic_Chapter3_Nicole_001.wav.transcript: What do you know? The whole city's following this case. In other words, it's a chance for us to make a name for ourselves.

Galgame_Chapter1_Nicole_81.wav.transcript: I see. So you planned to stop the demolition by blocking the train, but you didn't expect to find a bunch of vision reinforcements.

Galgame_ReliabilityNicole_Nicole_049.wav.transcript: Street Kid Rule Number Three. To catch a big fish, you gotta cast a long line. That piece was just the bait. The main score is the other nine pieces.

Galgame_GoldenWeek_Nicole_36.wav.transcript: The warehouse passcode! Some raiders cracked the passcode for Midsomer Incorporated's internal storage! Now we can get into the inner area of the warehouse!

Galgame_Chapter0_Nicole_28.wav.transcript: Since there's no way to monitor the real-time situation from the outside, we'll need your support and guidance inside the holo.

GalGame_Chapter000_Nicole_028_014.wav.transcript: If that's the case, the Red Fang Gang didn't snatch the strongbox for themselves. They're working a commission for someone else.

GalGame_Chapter050_Nicole_060_001.wav.transcript: You're finally awake. I'm so tired. Ambie? Star student? Are you guys okay?

Comic_Chapter3_Nicole_012.wav.transcript: Andy and the others are so slow. If they mess up now, the media will sensationalize it.

GalGame_Chapter050_Nicole_010_002.wav.transcript: What? Darn it, I have been going to the Outer Ring a lot lately. Good thing they can't give me a ticket because I always take my license plate off before I get back into town.

Galgame_GoldenWeek_Nicole_42.wav.transcript: Hm? Why, who on earth told you I made a huge profit from exploring C-41, paid off all my debts, and still have money left over?

Galgame_GoldenWeek_Nicole_11.wav.transcript: But it just so happens to be Camellia Golden Week. Most public security forces are out on the streets keeping the peace. So there's a gap in Subhollow C-41 security.

Galgame_ReliabilityNicole_Nicole_039.wav.transcript: How could you ever suggest I will pay my debts with a friendship like ours? I'm just holding on to some of your funds for a little while.

Galgame_Chapter1_Nicole_83.wav.transcript: But the proxies' plan to seize the train could work. It's true what they say about Fathan's wisdom and courage.

GalGame_Chapter050_Nicole_010_009.wav.transcript: Exactly! The main roads are filled with PubSec checkpoints armed to the Bangboo ears. If anything goes wrong and we need to use the hollows, we'll need a reliable proxy.

GalGame_Chapter050_Nicole_030_004.wav.transcript: Why are you all looking at me like that? That was my first gig on the street. I had no idea who she was. And she was so naive.

Galgame_GoldenWeek_Nicole_21.wav.transcript: Ha ha! Now that you approve, this year's Golden Week is definitely going to be a great one.

Comic_Chapter3_Nicole_022.wav.transcript: Thanks! Punishing evil and upholding justice is the mission of the cutting hairs. Ha! Ha ha ha!

Galgame_Chapter1_Nicole_74.wav.transcript: Quickly, Billy, Ami, go tell each of these gold nuggets, I mean victims, that the cutting hairs are willing to represent them in their lawsuit for compensation.

GalGame_ChapterAnbySP_Nicole_150_008.wav.transcript: Wait a sec. Are you trying to tarnish our reputation as an honest business?

GalGame_Chapter050_Nicole_010_010.wav.transcript: Come on. You're capable. We're close. Your prices are reasonable, the payment terms are fair, and the late fees are minimal.

Galgame_ReliabilityNicole_Nicole_054.wav.transcript: We'll claw back what's ours with our awe-inspiring might. The Cunninghairs are specialists in this business.

Galgame_GoldenWeek_Nicole_10.wav.transcript: Normally, even sub-hollows that are in decline are guarded carefully by public security, since they're still dangerous.

Comic_Chapter1_Nicole_020.wav.transcript: Ow! Ow! Ow! Ow! I almost got a concussion! I didn't expect to get out of the hollow like this.

Accompany_Nicole_Idle_02.wav.transcript: How about you shave off some of that debt I owe you? Silence means you agree, right?

Galgame_ReliabilityNicole_Nicole_002.wav.transcript: Check it out! I just won this artwork in an auction! What do you think? You interested in it?

Comic_Chapter0_Nicole_006.wav.transcript: Sorry, but it's not public security that commissioned us. And also, that's none of your business anyway.

Galgame_Chapter1_Nicole_67.wav.transcript: Vision always wanted to perform well enough to enter tops, but I never thought they'd stoop so low for a seat at the table.

GalGame_Chapter050_Nicole_030_018.wav.transcript: Proxy, I'm sorry. We might not be able to hold them off for long. Run as far as you can!

Galgame_Chapter0_Nicole_27.wav.transcript: Anyway, as Ambie said, the goal is simple. Find and retrieve the strong box.

GalGame_Chapter025_Nicole_010_003.wav.transcript: They've always had a pretty delicate relationship. That pup sec officer seems decent, though. Being willing to put all that aside and hand over the case.

Galgame_ReliabilityNicole_Nicole_014.wav.transcript: Never! How could someone as smart as I, Nicole, get hustled?

Chessboard_Limbo_CommonAvatar_Nicole_008.transcript: We've got to go all out when dealing with risky commissions, even if it means taking a hit to our profits.

GalGame_Chapter050_Nicole_060_003.wav.transcript: Okay, okay. We just gave you some emergency care to pull you back from the brink. No need to get into the details. You'd better see a doctor for a more thorough anti-corruption treatment after this.

GalGame_Chapter050_Nicole_030_005.wav.transcript: Anyway, I gave it back. You should have seen her reaction after losing the katana. The mighty Hoshimi Miyabi, actually.

Chessboard_Limbo_CommonAvatar_Nicole_014.transcript: Can't believe those jerks we just ran into! My new nails are chipped!

Comic_Chapter3_Nicole_002.wav.transcript: So, of course, I want to make sure I'm putting my best and prettiest face forward.

GalGame_Chapter025_Nicole_010_005.wav.transcript: Anyway, I'll do my best to help look for rain, so keep an eye out for some good news!

GalGame_Chapter050_Nicole_020_007.wav.transcript: Mm-hmm, exactly. I'm bringing in the youngest and biggest elephant new Eridu.

Galgame_GoldenWeek_Nicole_39.wav.transcript: That means we don't have much time to find the treasure, and the time limit's only bringing more and more hollow raiders in to join the hunt.

Comic_Chapter0_Nicole_042.wav.transcript: All that trouble to get here. But we're no closer to getting out. I didn't expect this would be the end.

Comic_Chapter1_Nicole_003.wav.transcript: I gotta say, don't you think it's unfair? After all, it's the ether corruption that killed your boss, not us cunning hairs.

GalGame_Chapter050_Nicole_060_002.wav.transcript: Welcome back to the real world. You made it out. If you'd stayed unconscious any longer, your sibling would have yeeted my butt into the hollow.

Comic_Chapter1_Nicole_027.wav.transcript: Nekomada, take him with us. Andy and Billy have gone to the driver's compartment. Proxy, let the residents know to be waiting at the platform.

GalGame_Chapter030_Nicole_020_012.wav.transcript: She used to send one every few days, max. But she's already sent five or six this morning.

GalGame_Chapter010_Nicole_045_005.wav.transcript: But the proxies' plan to seize the train could work. It's true what they say about Fathan's wisdom and courage.

GalGame_Chapter050_Nicole_010_001.wav.transcript: Phew! Made it! Why is traffic in the city always so slow? It's like half the speed of the outer ring!

GalGame_Chapter050_Nicole_030_009.wav.transcript: Oh, thank you for your professional opinion, Miss Class Rep. But your fancy talk isn't helping us decide what to do next.

Galgame_Chapter1_Nicole_69.wav.transcript: Fine, sure. We came into the dead-end hollow looking for something, and yeah, saving a kid along the way is a good thing, but... A small odd-job agency can't take on a massive corporation.

Galgame_Chapter1_Nicole_04.wav.transcript: Hmm, yeah, that won't be easy. The Red Fang Gang might be a mess right now, but as you saw earlier, they've got it in for us because of Silver's death.

Comic_Chapter0_Nicole_010.wav.transcript: You've made a mistake, mister. We aren't your enemy.

Chessboard_Limbo_CommonAvatar_Nicole_013.transcript: You have no idea what you're missing out on. Don't come crying to me if you regret it.

Galgame_ReliabilityNicole_Nicole_021.wav.transcript: Huh? Go over to your place to watch a movie together? Hmm, I guess I don't mind.

Galgame_ReliabilityNicole_Nicole_017.wav.transcript: Come to think of it, this is an opportunity. Maybe I can squeeze something out of that wretch instead.

GalGame_Chapter030_Nicole_020_002.wav.transcript: That was the plan. But I think there's something I need to discuss with you first. Or else I'll be distracted in court.

GalGame_Chapter050_Nicole_060_007.wav.transcript: Hmm? What? Are you embarrassed? That's not very like you, Fox.

GalGame_Chapter000_Nicole_028_013.wav.transcript: Hmm. So the proxy thinks there's something up with the flash drive holding the password. Is that hacker using it to trace you?

GalGame_Chapter010_Nicole_027_007.wav.transcript: But our plan with the train failed, so how are we going to get the residents out? They don't have any aptitude for ether.

Chessboard_Limbo_CommonAvatar_Nicole_009.transcript: Ahem, but as I said, we cutting hairs are professionals. We never make bad deals. I happen to have some great stuff I collected while exploring. So, maybe you're interested?

Galgame_GoldenWeek_Nicole_05.wav.transcript: I almost forgot about you. Good. Now that you're both here, let me tell you about the commission.

Galgame_GoldenWeek_Nicole_31.wav.transcript: The Cunning Hairs will gather more info about the warehouse while you keep exploring Holo C41. Bring us back those supply boxes so we can unlock them.

Galgame_GoldenWeek_Nicole_30.wav.transcript: So that's that. Our shared goal is settled. Find Midsummer Incorporated's mysterious treasure.

Galgame_GoldenWeek_Nicole_15.wav.transcript: So let's team up, Faithen. Besides, I heard you're getting ready for a Camellia Golden Week vacation. Tell me this. What do you need for any good vacation?

Galgame_Chapter0_Nicole_19.wav.transcript: I noticed it before. He always had it on his person. So it must contain something important.

GalGame_Chapter050_Nicole_030_002.wav.transcript: When she first joined Hand, she went on a mission and got duped big time. Even lost her precious family katana.

GalGame_Chapter050_Nicole_020_003.wav.transcript: Ha ha! Don't worry. Unlike this potato here, I, Nicole, am CEO of the Cunning Hairs in both name and skill. I've already got a plan.

Galgame_Chapter1_Nicole_60.wav.transcript: We can't keep going like this. How can we save anyone when we're in danger ourselves? We need a plan.

Comic_Chapter1_Nicole_021.wav.transcript: Ugh, seriously, why is every single commission such a struggle?

Galgame_GoldenWeek_Nicole_23.wav.transcript: I rented some clothes and a work car so it blends in on the streets of the Janice Quarter. Don't you think it looks just like the mascot for the association?

Comic_Chapter1_Nicole_002.wav.transcript: Okay, okay, I won't move. Take it easy, you two. Breathe in, breathe out.

Galgame_ReliabilityNicole_Nicole_012.wav.transcript: Look at the exquisite workmanship. Sure, it's a little rough around the edges. The colors are perfect. It's deliberately retro, I guess.

GalGame_Chapter050_Nicole_030_001.wav.transcript: Told ya I have powerful friends! In our line of work, connections are everything. As for how I know that battle-crazed fox, that's a story from way back.

GalGame_Chapter010_Nicole_027_008.wav.transcript: Aww! If only there was a way to give corruption resistance to everyone at once!

Comic_Chapter3_Nicole_014.wav.transcript: Just you wait. Whatever tricks you have up your sleeve, I'll make sure you get what's coming to you.

GalGame_Chapter030_Nicole_020_009.wav.transcript: Basically, it's just this. Lots of us who are close with Rain, including me, get messages from her every now and then. But they're all blank.

Galgame_GoldenWeek_Nicole_16.wav.transcript: No, not that. Denny's. Passion is great, but Denny's can triple your vibe in a flash.

Galgame_ReliabilityNicole_Nicole_040.wav.transcript: How dare you? Our partnership is absolutely ethically spotless. That's all there is to it.

Comic_Chapter1_Nicole_031.wav.transcript: I knew Vision wouldn't give up easily, so I contacted Bellobog as we got out of the holo.

Galgame_Chapter0_Nicole_18_04.wav.transcript: That's right. It's a mini storage device. It's Silver's. I picked it up in the building before I got out of 14th Street.

Galgame_ReliabilityNicole_Nicole_003.wav.transcript: Seeing as we're close, you can have it for the rock-bottom price of 8,888 Denny's.

GalGame_Chapter050_Nicole_010_003.wav.transcript: Relax. I double-checked. No one's tailing me. It's just me and my car.

GalGame_Chapter000_Nicole_028_015.wav.transcript: Well, judging by the fee, I assumed it was just a simple stolen goods job. But it's just another scumbag sticking their nose in other people's business again. I'm never trusting another agent ever again!

Galgame_ReliabilityNicole_Nicole_051.wav.transcript: Those are the cheap ones, of course. After the deal is done, if the other side wants to make trouble, public security will deal with them.

Galgame_ReliabilityNicole_Nicole_052.wav.transcript: Ha! That guy's always been greedy. There's no way he wouldn't gamble on the score being worth the risk.

GalGame_Chapter000_Nicole_028_004.wav.transcript: Good person, huh? Losing my life in a hollow just for a title like that? I must be stupid!

GalGame_Chapter050_Nicole_030_016.wav.transcript: I changed my mind. I think I made a mistake. We actually don't need your help. If I say that, will you leave? I'll comp all your travel costs.

Galgame_GoldenWeek_Nicole_69.wav.transcript: Damn it! My mysterious treasure! My gold! My golden week!

GalGame_Chapter010_Nicole_045_014.wav.transcript: Anyway, let's put this aside for now. First things first, we have to get that train and evacuate the residents out of here.

GalGame_Chapter030_Nicole_020_010.wav.transcript: At first, we didn't think anything of it. But then it continued for a couple weeks. And worse, apart from these messages, it's like she's disappeared into thin air.

GalGame_Chapter010_Nicole_027_013.wav.transcript: And we'll go check out the big guy in his lair and keep him busy while you bring in the explosives.

Galgame_GoldenWeek_Nicole_13.wav.transcript: So now, among holorators, rumor is C41 is full of high-value supply boxes. Maybe there'll be some intel posted to Internet soon.

Galgame_GoldenWeek_Nicole_49.wav.transcript: Oh yeah, I've also got some inside intel for ya. I heard there are actually other storage areas in C41, and there's even more valuable stuff in there. So what do you say? Wanna come exploring with me again?

GalGame_Chapter050_Nicole_010_008.wav.transcript: The enemies are out in the open and we're in the shadows. Based on past experience, we'll probably need a low-key plan.

Galgame_Chapter0_Nicole_15_02.wav.transcript: That wasn't fast enough? I put my foot down through every normal R255 green light.

GalGame_Chapter050_Nicole_060_004.wav.transcript: I'll fill you in. After your car crashed into the hollow, we got surrounded by those heavily armed mercenaries and had to take them out first. During the fight, we ran into the remaining Section 6 members.

GalGame_Chapter010_Nicole_045_008.wav.transcript: Nekomara's commission fee. I mean, we still haven't found her family heirloom. I thought maybe the residents here might know something.

Galgame_GoldenWeek_Nicole_27.wav.transcript: What? You've really never heard of Midsummer Incorporated? They were a major weapons manufacturer. They even challenged Three Gates Military Tech for the lion's share of the market.

GalGame_Chapter000_Nicole_027_003.wav.transcript: Don't drift off while guiding us. I paid Top Denny to hire the best proxy around, Faithen. Watch out or you might just get a negative rating on Internaut.

Comic_Chapter1_Nicole_004.wav.transcript: You're risking it all on a mistake. Don't you think you should try thinking for yourselves?

Galgame_ReliabilityNicole_Nicole_013.wav.transcript: The more I look at it, the more I feel like I've seen it before. I think I've seen the exact same one in the convenience store.

Galgame_GoldenWeek_Nicole_06.wav.transcript: You two love to joke around. I'm a regular here, so I'm just showing I care.

Galgame_GoldenWeek_Nicole_32.wav.transcript: As part of the deal, you can have anything useful you find inside. Consider it your vacation fund.

Comic_Chapter0_Nicole_045.wav.transcript: It's life and death here. Besides, if I don't get out, who's going to bring up the strong box? Just open it.

Comic_Chapter3_Nicole_009.wav.transcript: We don't owe anybody any money these days. Except for Faithen. And those other five loan sharks.

Galgame_Chapter1_Nicole_08.wav.transcript: You've got information on the Red Fang Gang. Plus, you can fight. So, why don't you come with us for now?

GalGame_Chapter050_Nicole_030_006.wav.transcript: You're done already? That was quick. As expected of the elephant.

Comic_Chapter0_Nicole_004.wav.transcript: You stole the strongbox from the Institute! We're just returning it to its rightful owner.

Galgame_Chapter0_Nicole_24.wav.transcript: Okay, everyone. Thanks to the proxy's help, preparations are complete. It's time for the next step.

Galgame_Chapter1_Nicole_65_01.wav.transcript: How can something as big as a mass evacuation of residents not be scheduled in advance? They just left everyone waiting for notice.

GalGame_Chapter050_Nicole_020_004.wav.transcript: Ever played jungle chess? Hare eats mouse, wolf eats hare, tiger eats wolf, elephant eats tiger, and mouse eats elephant.

Galgame_Chapter0_Nicole_18_03.wav.transcript: What are you talking about? It's a mini storage device. It's Silver's. I picked it up in the building before I got out of 14th Street.

Galgame_Chapter1_Nicole_64.wav.transcript: Um, excuse me, an officer? Did you say an officer came by?

Galgame_GoldenWeek_Nicole_68.wav.transcript: Midsomer Incorporated has been gone for years. How could I possibly get the key to their central warehouse now?

Galgame_GoldenWeek_Nicole_07.wav.transcript: Okay, okay. Let's not make a big deal out of it. Check this out. This is the target of your next commission.

Galgame_ReliabilityNicole_Nicole_029.wav.transcript: I kinda liked it. I was pretty invested. It's been a long time since the film held my interest.

Galgame_GoldenWeek_Nicole_45.wav.transcript: Abundant resources, not many enemies, little competition, and weak ether activity. It'd be my own personal wallet if it fit in my pocket.

Galgame_ReliabilityNicole_Nicole_033.wav.transcript: After all, I'm friends with the best video store manager in all new Eridu. Of course I'm going to use... Uh, I mean, work with you.

GalGame_Chapter050_Nicole_030_007.wav.transcript: That's not important. How did the interrogation go? I wasn't lying, was I? There's more to the vision scandal and bringers behind it.

GalGame_Chapter010_Nicole_045_012.wav.transcript: Ahem. Even though it was you who got it wrong to begin with, we're somewhat responsible as well.

Galgame_Chapter1_Nicole_82.wav.transcript: Huh, this means Vision is at the point of no return. They'll do whatever it takes to stop the residents from getting out.

Galgame_GoldenWeek_Nicole_33.wav.transcript: But don't throw away the other stuff you can't use. There might be some merchants interested in it. It's Camellia Golden Week after all. Lots of businesses will be buying and selling all sorts of stuff.

Galgame_Chapter1_Nicole_66_01.wav.transcript: There has to be more to it than this. I remember them saying, Vision Corporation won the bid thanks to a much lower cost.

Chessboard_Limbo_CommonAvatar_Nicole_005.transcript: Phew! Done. As much as I love this weapon, maintaining it is a pain.

GalGame_Chapter050_Nicole_020_005.wav.transcript: Cat hair, same difference. And you're not the mouse in this metaphor. That's the proxy. You're like a bug.

Comic_Chapter1_Nicole_030.wav.transcript: That's you with... Wait. That's Silver. From the Red Fang Gang.

GalGame_ChapterAnbySP_Nicole_150_005.wav.transcript: Come on. Nekomada's usually the one who's squeezing in between you and me. Show me some sincerity here.

Galgame_GoldenWeek_Nicole_46.wav.transcript: It's gotta be just a rumor. Please, don't let anything happen to C-41. Please let C-41 be okay. It promised me it would make me rich.

Galgame_ReliabilityNicole_Nicole_004.wav.transcript: No way! I bought it for 888 Denny's. The one at the convenience store is definitely fake.

Galgame_GoldenWeek_Nicole_70.wav.transcript: Oh, right. I guess I can't do anything about it. Give me a few videotapes, then.

Galgame_GoldenWeek_Nicole_19.wav.transcript: Well then, how about we turn this golden week vacation into a real golden week, huh?

Comic_Chapter1_Nicole_005.wav.transcript: The cutting hair's entire savings are in this briefcase. I'll give you half if you pretend you didn't see me today. How about it?

Comic_Chapter0_Nicole_013.wav.transcript: You can stay and fight us and then get caught by public security. Or you can run and we all get to live.

Accompany_Nicole_GameShop_Lose.wav.transcript: Good thing I didn't bet on that one. Goes to show how great my judgment is.

Galgame_GoldenWeek_Nicole_26.wav.transcript: You must have noticed when you went there yourself. That warehouse preserved in such good condition as it is? Well, it likely belongs to Midsummer Incorporated.

GalGame_Chapter050_Nicole_060_009.wav.transcript: This fox even agreed to hold off on arresting you until further investigation is complete, and she'd cooperate with you as an ally until then. You know the rest.

Galgame_GoldenWeek_Nicole_02.wav.transcript: Promotions for Camellia Golden Week are getting into full swing and the streets are packed. I was worried you'd be wandering around outside for ages.

Galgame_ReliabilityNicole_Nicole_032.wav.transcript: Nah, it wasn't disappointing. I learned something at least. Like, we should trust in the power of friendship.

GalGame_Chapter050_Nicole_010_004.wav.transcript: Pearlman is still in the outer ring. Anby, Billy, Nekomata, and the sons of Caledon are keeping an eye on him.

Galgame_GoldenWeek_Nicole_34.wav.transcript: Make a big holiday shopping list, Faithen. Soon, we'll be swimming in Denny's.

GalGame_ChapterAnbySP_Nicole_150_012.wav.transcript: You're not the only one here with a troubled past. I just wish you'd trust me more. Otherwise, I feel like I'm a total failure.

Galgame_Chapter1_Nicole_56.wav.transcript: Guess it can't be helped. But I agree, we can't just leave a kid in a place like this.

Galgame_ReliabilityNicole_Nicole_008.wav.transcript: Uh, but on closer inspection... Oh, I think something really is off about it. The finish is too rough.

Galgame_ReliabilityNicole_Nicole_018.wav.transcript: Anyway... Thank you for today. Feel free to contact me directly if you need anything in the future.

Galgame_ReliabilityNicole_Nicole_048.wav.transcript: Sharp eyes. Could you tell just by looking? Or are you guessing? That piece was really worth over $300,000.

GalGame_Chapter010_Nicole_045_007.wav.transcript: Right. By the way, there was an old Red Fang Gang base in the hollow somewhere around here. Have you heard of it?

Galgame_GoldenWeek_Nicole_28.wav.transcript: But the fall of the old capital hit them real bad, and soon they disappeared from the industry. But just before that happened, they held a press conference announcing a mysterious treasure to boost their struggling performance.

Galgame_ReliabilityNicole_Nicole_035.wav.transcript: No wonder you're my friend. So loyal. I'm counting on you.

GalGame_Chapter010_Nicole_045_003.wav.transcript: I see. So you planned to stop the demolition by blocking the train, but you didn't expect to find a bunch of vision reinforcements.

Galgame_Chapter1_Nicole_57.wav.transcript: A kid's aptitude for ether is underdeveloped, and she can't save herself. Every minute spent in the hollow is dangerous, not to mention the dead-end butcher is around here somewhere.

Galgame_GoldenWeek_Nicole_67.wav.transcript: I spent so much time, money, and connections finding Midsomer's stupid mysterious treasure. So tell me, why does its core vault still have a physical lock?

GalGame_Chapter025_Nicole_010_002.wav.transcript: Yeah, I get it. Hand is better than public security at investigating this kind of weird stuff.

GalGame_Chapter010_Nicole_045_004.wav.transcript: Huh, this means Vision is at the point of no return. They'll do whatever it takes to stop the residents from getting out.

Galgame_Chapter0_Nicole_02.wav.transcript: That's not it. I was set up by public security and that angry reporter from Redo TV.

GalGame_ChapterAnbySP_Nicole_150_015.wav.transcript: piece of cake. On average, finding a cat takes us three hours, 14 minutes, and eight seconds. Finding a person is way easier.

Galgame_ReliabilityNicole_Nicole_050.wav.transcript: They get greedy and think we're too dumb to figure out the true value and undoubtedly try to buy up the rest real fast.

GalGame_Chapter050_Nicole_060_005.wav.transcript: It was a tough situation, so we joined forces to take down the mercenaries. Just when we were ready to head into the Hollow to find you, Section 6 got a message from Miyabi saying you were with her and that you were in danger.

Accompany_Nicole_Eyek_02.wav.transcript: It's on the house this time. Next time you stare at me like this, I'm charging you by the minute.

Comic_Chapter3_Nicole_020.wav.transcript: Besides, we have a relationship with Faithen. Those guys, they're completely new. Nothing to worry about.

Galgame_GoldenWeek_Nicole_09.wav.transcript: This isn't any old box. A few days ago, a small sub-hollow called C-41 was suppressed, with the Hollow Investigative Association designating it officially in decline. It'll gradually shrink for two weeks before completely vanishing.

Galgame_GoldenWeek_Nicole_12.wav.transcript: Some other raiders got in and found a huge well-preserved warehouse in C-41. The walls were coated in a special corruption-resistant alloy, and there were stacks of supply boxes inside. I heard some pretty incredible weapons were found inside some of them.
